Question: Flags were flown at half-staff on the day of this person's funeral.
Hints: Following his graduation from Purdue, this person decided to become an experimental research test pilot.
This person flew 78 missions over Korea for a total of 121 hours in the air, most of which were in January 1952.
On March 22, 1956, this person was in a Boeing B-29 Superfortress, which was to air-drop a Douglas D-558-2 Skyrocket.
